title: Anthropic closes $30 billion funding round as cash keeps flowing into top AI startups
summary_full: After OpenAI raised the largest private tech financing round on record last year at over $40 billion, Anthropic is now second, with its $30 billion raise.
summary_public: After OpenAI raised the largest private tech financing round on record last year at over $40 billion, Anthropic is now second, with its $30 billion raise.
